body_html: You probably don't have 124 GB available at the point where you try to allocate 72GB. It looks like the triggering call is torch.stack. Unless you have repeated inputs, there's a good chance that the inputs use up 72 GB as well.
body_text: You probably don't have 124 GB available at the point where you try to allocate 72GB. It looks like the triggering call is torch.stack. Unless you have repeated inputs, there's a good chance that the inputs use up 72 GB as well.
body: You probably don't have 124 GB available at the point where you try to allocate 72GB. It looks like the triggering call is `torch.stack`. Unless you have repeated inputs, there's a good chance that the inputs use up 72 GB as well.
